rules_text:
Ward–Pay 3 life, discard a card. [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 3 life and discards a card.)[/i]
[i]Puppetry[/i] – Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell during your first main phase, gain control of target creature with mana value 4 or less. Untap them. They gain haste until end of turn.
